definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: In this paper, a new optical fiber dynamic pressure transducer is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹一種新穎的光導纖維動態壓力傳感器。

sentences.english: Fiber-optic cables are the lifelines for connecting Internet users on different continents.
sentences.chinese: 光導纖維是各大洲的互聯網用戶相互聯絡的生命線。

sentences.english: JD- I applied advanced fibre-optic technology and optoelectronics for information processing.
sentences.chinese: 儀器採用先進的光導纖維和光電子信息處理技術。

sentences.english: This article summarizes a novel design for casting internal illumination system of optical fibre beams.
sentences.chinese: 光導纖維束落射內照明系統的創新設計總結。

sentences.english: A sensor channels the light signal along an optical fibre.
sentences.chinese: 傳惑器沿光導纖維輸送光信號。

sentences.english: Tumors in deep part that optic fibre cannot reach to.
sentences.chinese: 光導纖維不能到達的深部腫瘤。

sentences.english: It is of great use for the image—transmission fiber bundle in wide use.
sentences.chinese: 對光導纖維傳象束的廣泛應用有一定的參考作用。
